        protected int generateMenuScreen()
        Description copied from class: BaseMenu
        An abstract class that the other classes that inherits this class needs to override and implement
        Specified by:
        generateMenuScreen in class BaseMenu
        Returns:
        Exit Codes for BaseMenu.startMainMenu() to implement. 0 to loop into the method again, negative to return false and positive to return true
